arts.ttl: Wolves vs Crystal Palace – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: A new era begins at Molineux on Saturday afternoon as Rob Edwards takes charge of his first game as Wolves manager. The hosts are rooted to the bottom of the table and remain the only side in the Premier League yet to win a game this season. arts.ttl: Wolves vs Crystal Palace – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Wolves welcome Crystal Palace to Molineux on Saturday for a match that marks the start of Rob Edwards’ tenure as head coach. The former Luton boss faces a monumental task today. He takes over a team that is winless after 11 games and sits bottom of the Premier League table. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace XI vs Wolves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Crystal Palace travel to the West Midlands on Saturday, looking to spoil Rob Edwards’ welcome party at Wolves. The Eagles are in steady form. In fact, they remain unbeaten in their last four matches across all competitions. They currently sit comfortably in 10th place, a testament to their solid start under Oliver Glasner. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace star Tyrick Mitchell dispels theory about Rob Edwards and Wolves
arts.sum: The battle for survival for Rob Edwards begins, and Wolves will be hoping the injection of a new voice can be what they need to retain their Premier League status. The arrival of Rob Edwards can galvanise the squad immediately, but Crystal Palace star Tyrick Mitchell is not a believer in this theory.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Crystal Palace: Premier League 25/26 Preview, Gameweek 12
arts.sum: In his place, Wolves brought back Rob Edwards, who had previously managed Luton Town in the Premier League . Wolves already came into the game knowing that they had been safe from relegation for a long time, but seven months on, their Premier League, survival hopes are already beginning to look unlikely.

arts.ttl: Wolves under-21 lineup gives major hint towards Rob Edwards' selection for Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Wolves fans, how do you see Rob Edwards getting on in his first game against Crystal Palace? This led to James Collins giving the likes of Tawanda Chirewa, Enso Gonzalez and Mateus Mane a chance in the first-team Wolves squad to face Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner reflects on the threat of the ‘new manager bounce’ for Wolves
arts.sum: He started with Middlesbrough in this shape, but then changed it, and of course the analysts and my staff will look back also at what he did at Middlesbrough and what he did with Luton, because every manager has his own ideas. “We have to prepare the team now to stay as successful as we started this season.

arts.ttl: Glasner confirms triple Crystal Palace injury boost before Wolves trip
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner delivers a positive update on the fitness of his Crystal Palace squad ahead of Saturday’s Premier League clash with Wolverhampton Wanderers at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Crystal Palace predictions: No new manager bounce for Edwards
arts.sum: New Wolves boss Rob Edwards is unlikely to enjoy a win in his first game in charge against Crystal Palace, says Elliott Bretland.
